data.why:
This tool is going to develop into a generic library for
    manipulating directory-based file formats:

    http://bugbear.blackfish.org.uk/~bruno/draft/

    These are some earlier modules I probably won't contribute to CPAN
    due to exceptional slowness:

    http://bugbear.blackfish.org.uk/~bruno/Image-RGBA/
    http://bugbear.blackfish.org.uk/~bruno/Image-Panorama/
